name: Solar System (itch) (jameskevich)
description:
My version of the Solar System assignment for Michigan State University's Game Design and Development course. Some of the edits I made to the base assignment:

  • Added the rest of the planets in the solar system
  • Modified relative scale, distance, and rotation speed for each planet to be more scientifically accurate 
  • Modified Comet Spawner to spawn comets in random directions (I didn't like how they originally all spawned on the X axis)
  • Tweaked lighting and colors to my liking and added an orange glow to the sun game object
  • Added a RotateAround script to the main camera
